data.html_text: Hey @Esraa, Let’s focus primarily on English copies for now, then test Arabic versions later. As Eng. Moataz mentioned, our main focus should be on targeting countries outside the Arabic-speaking market. Once the English versions are finalized and validated, we can create a Saudi Arabia dialect version of the same messages. I am proposing the following copies that revolve around the core positioning tailored for CTF organizers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1i7Xlk_1eFVY90lBUQQspIcofuPfwiYB3TcBHJl1lzI4/edit?usp=sharing Let me know your thoughts.
data.text:
Hey https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1208485999028683,
Let’s focus primarily on English copies for now, then test Arabic versions later. As Eng. Moataz mentioned, our main focus should be on targeting countries outside the Arabic-speaking market. Once the English versions are finalized and validated, we can create a Saudi Arabia dialect version of the same messages.

I am proposing the following copies that revolve around the core positioning tailored for CTF organizers:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1i7Xlk_1eFVY90lBUQQspIcofuPfwiYB3TcBHJl1lzI4/edit?usp=sharing

Let me know your thoughts.

data.html_text: @Esraa Hey Esraa, I like the first two directions. But we need to further refine the ad format itself to drive better results. Based on experience, there are three formats that consistently perform well for this type of product. We can absolutely keep your creative direction, but adapt it within those formats.
